ppy/osu.summary: Recent activities in the osu repository include two significant pull requests. The first pull request changes the `OsuModRelax` hit leniency to match the stable version, addressing the issue of different leniency values, as described in pull request #31134. The second pull request introduces a new method called `consistentRatioPenalty` to evaluate consistency penalties in rhythmic ratios for the `Colour` skill, building upon the changes proposed in #31284. These updates aim to enhance the gaming experience and fix existing issues in the osu game.

ppy/osu-wiki.summary: The osu-wiki repository has seen recent activity with a push event that expanded system mod articles, fixed compatibility issues with Touch Device mods, and included minor adjustments such as parentheses corrections. This update also merged the system-mods branch into the master branch, as outlined in pull request #12598, contributing to the growth and improvement of the osu wiki's content and compatibility.
